Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted with high-quality materials and cutting-edge technology, ensuring it stands out in its category. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all these aspects, I kindly propose a price of $15000 for this product. I trust this price reflects its true value and the benefits it offers. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
